method.name: activate
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: deactivate
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: status

parameter.name: $locale
parameter.description: The locale to check the status for. If NULL, check only if translator is activated. It is NULL by default.

method.returndescription: Returns whether the user is a translator and the translaction locale is the current locale of the system.

method.name: join
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: leave
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: profile
method.description: Checks if the user is translator and returns the profile.
method.returndescription: Returns in array the profile of the translator (id, locale, languageName etc).

method.name: sessionStatus
method.description: Performs an inner check of the translator's status.

parameter.name: $locale
parameter.description: The locale value to check against session value.

method.returndescription: Returns whether the user is a translator and the translaction locale is the current locale of the system.
